nodes.text: Within the depths of the royal palace of Iziz was a laboratory that belonged to King Ommin. The laboratory was an old, abandoned, storage facility that housed spare parts for Ommin's mechanical exoskeleton as well as decommissioned and dilapidated droids. It was in King Ommin's laboratory where Jedi Knight Cay Qel-Droma, after recently losing his arm in battle with Queen Amanoa's Dark Side Adepts, found the spare appendage of an old XT-6 model droid to serve as a prosthetic replacement limb.
